This program allows to pack JavaScript code into URL.

For example, `alert('Hello, world!')` can be packed into https://vort.github.io/u2j/#4xyur2kekhD3FWATapsbr9btPZrT

It allows to host small programs inside the link itself.  
Unpacking is performed by static html page, data after `#` is not transmitted to the server.

Here is an example of a program with more functionality packed in the same way: [Mini2048](https://vort.github.io/u2j/#) ([source](https://js1k.com/2015-hypetrain/details/2113)).
